sentences.sContent: If you added any text at that time, you should see it now.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you added any text at that time, you should see it now.
sentences.sCn: 如果您在那时添加了任何文本，那么现在就会看到这些文本。

sentences.sContent: So when I do ask him to come with me to something at that time, he happily does.
sentences.sContent_eng: So when I do ask him to come with me to something at that time, he happily does.
sentences.sCn: 所以当我需要他在那时去做一些事情的时候，他都会很高兴地答应。
